name: Watchseries
additional_info:
Sometimes the address will change but I will try to keep up with the changes so update when needed.

19 june 2018:
-They changed the address, fixed.
-For some reason the "I watched this episode" does not work on the web so when you click that and go back to the episode list the site acts as if you were not done anything. Result; the color of the episode remains the same for all the episodes. I will try to fix that as soon as they fix it. (It got fixed a couple of weeks ago and I waited to see if indeed it was working).

12 mars 2018:
-I added https because apparently now this address is the one they use. I kept both http/https, though, just in case they change again.
